definition: to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: Last night, Yugang view of the parents play the scene, causing just wire sought after.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚，李玉刚的父母到场观演，惹起刚丝们追捧。

sentences.english: Two-thirds of the people present are against the plan.
sentences.chinese: 到场的三分之二的人都反对这个计划。

sentences.english: Whether the weather is good or bad, neither father nor Iam going to the gathering.
sentences.chinese: 无论气候是好是坏，父亲和我都不去到场那个聚首。

sentences.english: Please cross those people off the name list if they are unable to come.
sentences.chinese: 请把那些没法到场的人的名字从名单中划去。

sentences.english: At this time, the streets of the staff to do the scene and immediately cordoned off the area.
sentences.chinese: 这时，街道办的工作人员也到场并马上封锁现场。

sentences.english: I asked Baobao, Tiantian and other little friends to come to my party.
sentences.chinese: 我请了宝宝，苦苦战其他小朋友去到场我的死日散会。

sentences.english: Students and guests at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 学员们和到场嘉宾在开学典礼上合影。

sentences.english: The entrance of a Grants and Crawfords was a favourable epoch.
sentences.chinese: 格兰特夫妇和克劳福特姐弟的到场是一个有力的转折。

sentences.english: The official reason given for the President's absence was sickness.
sentences.chinese: 对外公布的总统未到场原因是身体有恙。

sentences.english: As each youngster arrived at the scene, it wasclearly overwhelmed with excitement and nervousness.
sentences.chinese: 每只到场的幼仔，显然都被兴奋和焦躁压得喘不过气。

sentences.english: You may apply in person or by letter.
sentences.chinese: 你可以亲自到场或去信提出声请。

sentences.english: Bureau members and ministers, deputy ministers and liaisons are to the scene.
sentences.chinese: 主席团成员和各部部长副部长，联络员必须到场。

sentences.english: The affected examinees can take a free make-up test.
sentences.chinese: 受影响的考生可以选择到场不收费重考。

sentences.english: You were there every day, every day and every week.
sentences.chinese: 你每天，每天和每个星期都到场啊。

sentences.english: On the evening of the Inauguration, Michelle and I will attend the first-ever Neighborhood Inaugural Ball…
sentences.chinese: 并且我们希望你也能到场参与，无论你的社区是哪里。

sentences.english: The customs shall send personnel for onsite supervision if the application is approved upon verification.
sentences.chinese: 海关审核同意的，派员到场实际监管。
